TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridTextBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle

summary.span: 在 的单元格中承载 控件以便编辑字符串。

span.span: Hosts a control in a cell of a for editing strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自`abstract`类。The class derives from the `abstract` class . 在运行时，主机允许用户编辑文本的控件。At run time, the hosts a control that allows users to edit text. 添加到类的特殊属性包括，和。Special properties added to the class include , and . 这些属性使你能够访问所承载控制其特性，并设置显示值的格式。These properties allow you to access the hosted control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values. 如果数据源是包含对象，属性应设置为以逻辑方式在文本框控件中进行编辑的数据类型。If the data source is a containing objects, the property of the should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control. 以下数据类型会自动与关联: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following data types are automatically associated with a : , , , , , , , , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 不完全支持以下类型： ， ， ， ，和。The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: , , , , and . （不允许运算符。）(Operators are not allowed.) ## Examples 下面的示例创建和将其添加到的。The following example creates a and adds it to the of a . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到窗体具有名为`dataGrid1`和调用它的构造函数从。To run this code example, paste it into a form that has a named `dataGrid1` and call it from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 该方法检查以确保确实发生了编辑。The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring. 如果是这样，它正确格式值。If so, it formats the value appropriately. 如果值为`null`，该方法进入到列; 否则，它将使用方法来提交值。If the value is `null`, the method enters into the column; otherwise, it uses the method to commit the value. 调用该方法编辑时，才提交操作。The method is called by the when an editing operation is committed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 站点正在编辑的单元格的位置处的网格上的控件。The sites a control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited. 调用该方法类的将要开始编辑操作时的方法。The method is called by the class's method when an editing operation is about to begin. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法可以更改在单击的单元格的文本控件。The following example uses the method to change the text of a clicked cell in the control. MemberSignature.Value: public string Format { get; set; }
.property instance string Format
Public Property Format As String
public: property System::String ^ Format { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定格式化文本的方法的一个或多个字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.

value.span: 指定格式化文本的方法的一个或多个字符。

span.span: The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定列中显示值的方式。The property specifies how values are displayed in the column. 例如，设置为"c"，以指定，将为本地货币值进行格式设置的属性。For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency. 计算机用于确定实际货币格式。The for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format. 数据更改时，值是自动的本机类型到未格式化。The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed. 有关格式设置字符，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 你应用的格式应为适合于数据类型。The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type. 例如，如果数据实际为数字使用数字格式字符串之一。For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings. 你可以更改为通过设置到新的属性实例构造替换为相应的区域性 id。You can change the for a by setting the property to a new instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID. 若要设置对于应用程序，设置属性到新的对象实例构造替换为相应的区域性 id。To set the for the application, set the property of the object to a new instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新对象，并将它分配给属性对象。The following example creates a new object and assigns it to the property of a object. 该示例还将为"c"，以指定列应显示为货币值的属性。The example also sets the property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency. [!code-cpp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CPP/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CS/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/VB/datagridtextboxcolumn format.vb#1)]

.property instance class System.IFormatProvider FormatInfo
Public Property FormatInfo As IFormatProvider
public: property IFormatProvider ^ FormatInfo { IFormatProvider ^ get(); void set(IFormatProvider ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于确定格式化值的方法的特定区域性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.

value.span: 实现 接口的一个对象，如 类。

span.span: An object that implements the interface, such as the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置时属性设成一个格式设置字符，使用提供的信息属性进一步指定要使用何种区域性特定格式。When setting the property to one of the formatting characters, the uses the information provided by the property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use. 例如，当属性设置为 （对于货币） 格式字符"c"，可以进一步指定使用里拉的符号。For example, when the property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used. 若要执行此操作，创建一个新对象意大利，区域设置 id，并将属性设置为新对象。To do this, create a new object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the property to the new object. 有关格式设置字符，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新对象，并将它分配给属性对象。The following example creates a new object and assigns it to the property of a object. 该示例还将为"c"，以指定列应显示为货币值的属性。The example also sets the property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency. [!code-cpp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CPP/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CS/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/VB/datagridtextboxcolumn format.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最佳的宽度和高度被通过测量字符串大小、 其字体和属性，并考虑和加上边距值。The optimum width and height is calculated by measuring the string size, taking into account its font and attributes, and adding margin values. ## Examples 下面的示例使用返回。The following example uses to return a .
